section.title: Purpose
section.lines: Generate the service delegate for each Datasets

section.title: More information
section.p:
For each Datasets which look up the dataset ejb (generated by the EJB cartridge) and exposes the following:
findById(id)
findByIds(list)
findAll()
findByQuery(query)
create()
save()
saveAll(list)
remove(id)
removeAll(ids)
validate(object)
validateAll(objects)

section.title: Technologies
section.p: Xpand (was originally developed as part of openArchitectureWare project before it became a component under eclipse.)
